content: निष्पद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To issue out of, spring from. {@--2@} To be produced, be brought about, arise, to be effected; निष्पद्यंते च सस्यानि <ls>Ms. 9. 247.</ls> {@--3@} To be got ready or prepared. {@--4@} To become ripe, ripen. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To produce, bring about, cause, effect, prepare; त्वं नित्यमेकमेव पटं निष्पादयसि <ls>Pt. 5.</ls>
